answer:
QUESTION

I was curios when we die, and are reserected, would we be in the state that we died?  An example, is from Skeikh Feiz, like stealing. If we die as we are stealing, we will appear in front of God in that that state.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh
 

Rasulullah salallahu alayhi wasallam said “People will be resurrected on the day of Qiyamat according to their actions.”

The sheikh was correct in his statement, however if one makes tauba from his wrongs and evils he will be forgiven by Allah and he will be raised in a pure state.

And Allah Ta'ala Knows Best



Wassalamu Alaykum



Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
